results.title: Futures Mixed; Disney, Palantir, Oracle, Tesla Early Movers - Investor's Business Daily
results.content:
Oracle stock dived 15.6% in January to seven-month lows, more than 50% off its all-time high set last September.

## Stock Market Today: Tesla Stock Falls Amid SpaceX Buzz

Tesla stock fell 2% in premarket trade. Elon Musk's SpaceX and xAI are in advanced merger talks, Bloomberg reported early Monday. Tesla stock rose 3.3% to 430.41 on Friday following a prior Bloomberg report that SpaceX was mulling a merger with xAI or the electric-vehicle giant.

Tesla stock still fell 4.15% last week, hitting a two-month low Thursday following fourth-quarter results, with analysts busy slashing 2026 estimates. A decisive move above the 50-day line could offer an early entry in an emerging base.

Please follow Michael Larkin on X at @IBD\_MLarkin for more analysis of growth stocks. [...] ↑
X

Due to the restructuring, Workday now expects its fourth quarter GAAP operating margin to be 24 to 25 percentage points lower than its non-GAAP operating margin, with full-year GAAP operating margin 22 to 23 percentage points lower.

Workday is scheduled to report its fiscal 2026 fourth quarter and full-year financial results on Tuesday, February 24, 2026.
